org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class AltAutomatonCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AltAutomatonCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class AltAutomatonCodec
extends AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
    An AltAutomatonCodec can encode an alternating automaton in GOAL file format (GFF) and decode a GFF file back to an alternating automaton. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Description copied from class: AutomatonCodec
        Returns the type of the automaton to be encoded or decoded. The type will appear in the GFF file as an attribute of the root element.
